attributes.review: Trumpy trump rlly messed up big time. Now I’m not one of those hippy dippy gen z terrorists who wanna take this app down, but they mighta got somethin right.  He, on this app was spouting insanity saying that it was okay to kill ~babies~ and that he will actually not say the n word even in rap musiccc. And like that’s just not okay. Women who get pregnant need to stay that way and this is AmErICa we have freedom of speech and like Donnie is like saying that humans have rights to healthcare and they can’t be discriminated against based on their sexual preference or race or gender. Like who does he think he is. We are the~✨ HoMe OF ThE FrEe ✨~ anyways  this app is a joke and full of leftist propaganda it must be removed.
attributes.title: Crazy snowflake business

attributes.review:
So this app brought my dead grandma to life.
Should I be concerned?

I was walking around my house and I noticed my mom and dad watching the news and I saw DONALD on it not surprised 🙄 and so I thought hmm I wonder if he made an app. So I go to the App Store and see this app and I get it, FIVE MINUTES LATER MY DOG GOT HIT BY A CAR THAT HAD TRUMP 2020 FLAGS. NOW I CAN ONLY WALK MY SELF 😭😭 DONT GET THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: hey i’m anna borshin💕 and i must say this app was terrible❌, not user friendly‼️, helps a racist, rapist, homophobic, islamphobic, xenophobic, bunker boy, baby man😡, and i don’t recommend downloading it👀, don’t bother wasting  you’re time republicans because either way the app is horrible🖕🏼, glitches all the time and takes up a bunch of space, don’t trust it, it will see you info to the scary communists😾if i were you i would just give it 1 star and move along😙have a nice day and remember 💚Anyone But Trump 2020💙

attributes.review: This app took an unacceptable amount of time to download. I got it to support my favorite Cheeto, but was left with pure disappointment. My phone ended up flying! It flew away just like Donald’s wig did to him💕. Sorry my president I get a little rude when disappointed.✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Don’t download 💜
